name: Clean Roll 3D
description:
Come challenge your hand-eye coordination and reaction!
Slide your finger to control the ball, try to avoid all obstacles, and absorb as many elements as possible. Absorb as many elements as possible and push them into the box. Try to avoid the obstacles, thus to maintain your loads.
You need to absorb a qualified amount at each stage to complete the level, and push into the box for reward.
Stunning scenes, wonderful experience.
Now, let's control the ball and wait for challenges!
How far can you go?

Features:
• Simple one-touch control
• Wonderful graphics
• Abundant game scenes for you to unlock
• Free to play
